page.title: 11Brownies and Cubs
page.content: The 1st Baltonsborough Pack was start- ed on 1st May 1976. There are 12 Brown -ies. The uniform is a brown dress, hat, belt and a yellow tie. Meetings are held every Thursday at the Village Hall from 5.45pm until 7pm and the subscription is 25p per week. The leaders are Brown Owl and Lark. There are lots of different activities. Badges are worked for and there are trips to the beach, horse riding and swimming. The Cub Pack was started in April 1984. There are now 18 cubs who pay 20p a week. Meetings are on Monday evenings at 6.30pm at the Village Hall and are led by Akela, Baloo and Shere Khan. During the meetings cubs play games and work for their badges. The uniform is a green jumper, red and black neckerchief with black or grey for the other items.
